Text: The download link to this torrent is fixed now.
Have your files been tested on a PS3? Just want to make sure it will play on my system before I download. Thanks!

@hauntnut

Sony PS3 is an AVCHD compatible blu-ray player, so yes, it will play the DVD5 disk if you burn it, but as a file, PS3 will only read files up to 4Gb in size because of it's ridiculous FAT32 limitations - this can be upgraded, or you can extract the movie and stream it from your network server.
Thank you for your response! :-) Your work is very much appreciated, and looks great!

@ McBoingBoing

Why are you looking for DVD folders when this is a HD blu-ray iso? Perhaps you should read the torrent's notes before posting stupid comments.
